0: We ate a healthy breakfast in the restaurant
We had breakfasr at the Steinway in the morning which was good with great service
The food at restaurant was pretty good and prices accordingly
As an added bonus the food in the restaurant was FANTASTIC
Excellent bar and restaurant in the lobby with skilled bartenders
Yet another meet up and a superb Evening meal
I asked for the quinoa and kale salad on the menu
The bar lounge area was very nice and the menu there was great
Staff at the bar and front desk are friendly and helpful
1: BUT this hotel is supposed to have a restaurant and bar
The front desk staff was eager to position the “ grab and go ” pantry as a substitute for a restaurant and I guess that would be true if you ’re looking for a stale pre made wrap and a bag of Doritos
So only some snacks and beverages available in the lobby and vending machines
2: Meals at the restaurant are good but the service is a catastrophe
Breakfast bar is a little pricey but very convenient
I am all for this but the floor was very slippery and there was no grab bar
Also buffet breakfast was overpriced for a pretty average selections
Under Mariot Gold would have had access to the MClub and free breakfast under the new status he does not have those privileges
Dinner was a bit expensive but was very good
We ordered room service which the food was good but you could not order any drinks like soda or juice you would have to go downstairs to purchase that
This was long before the lunch was served
One star missing because you have to pay for breakfast and everything else
The member lounge was adequate although many of the snacks and drinks were wiped out when I arrived
